plugins.name: FillGPT
plugins.description:
FillGPT is an AI-powered Figma plugin designed to improve workflow efficiency by automating content generation, text optimization, and design analysis. It helps designers, copywriters, and product teams enhance UI copy, rename layers, and analyze design best practices.


Key features:


- Smart layer renaming to keep files organized

- AI-generated content for UI elements and marketing copy

- Copy enhancement, including expanding, shortening, and rephrasing text

- Tone and style adjustment to match different contexts

- Design analysis to improve clarity, accessibility, and readability

- Grammar and spelling error detection and correction

- Text summarization and expansion for better content flow


FillGPT streamlines the design process, ensuring high-quality text and a more efficient workflow within Figma.

plugins.name: Clean Gradients
plugins.description:
Problem:

When using a standard gradient with two colors, if there is a large gap between their tones, the saturation in the middle decreases significantly, and the color in this area may appear grayish-resulting in a ¬´muddy¬ª shade.


Solution:

With just two clicks, the plugin eliminates the ¬´muddy¬ª effect in the middle of the gradient by adding three additional intermediate color stops.


How to use the plugin:

1. The colors for the initial gradient can be taken either from an existing gradient element by selecting it and clicking the ¬´Pick gradient¬ª button or by using the ¬´Color Picker¬ª tool on the left and right of the button.

2. To apply the gradient, select the desired element and click the ¬´Apply gradient¬ª button.
plugins.tagline: Cleans the gradient from ¬´dirt¬ª

plugins.name: Logify
plugins.description:
Logify ‚Äî Version Tracking for Design Systems


Keep your design system consistent ‚Äî and versioned. This plugin helps you track changes to local styles and components in your Figma file, presenting differences in a clean, structured changelog directly on the canvas.


No need to log edits manually ‚Äî Logify detects added, modified, and removed elements automatically.


What you can do:

  1. Compare current and previous file states

plugins.name: StyleSnap - Create AI Icons in Any Style
plugins.description:
Effortlessly create custom icons in any style with StyleSnap ‚Äì the smart Figma plugin that brings AI-powered icon generation right where you work.


Whether you're designing a sleek UI or crafting a detailed illustration, StyleSnap lets you instantly replicate any icon style and generate new icons in seconds ‚Äì all royalty-free and within Figma.


Perfect for designers who love consistency, speed, and creativity.


üéØ Right-Click Style Capture: Instantly capture the style of any icon in your Figma file with a simple right-click.


üñåÔ∏è AI-Powered Icon Generation: Describe the icon you want, and StyleSnap will create it to match the style you selected ‚Äì from minimal to highly illustrative.


‚ôæÔ∏è Style Agnostic: Works with any style ‚Äì flat, outlined, detailed, 3D-inspired, or even hand-drawn.


üé® Perfect for UI & Illustrations: Whether you're building out a clean interface or adding a creative touch, StyleSnap generates icons that feel perfectly on-brand.


üîì Royalty-Free Icons: All generated icons are yours to use freely, with no licensing worries.


‚ö° No Asset Library Needed: Skip the endless searches. Just pick a style, describe your icon, and go.


üë®‚Äçüé® Great for Teams & Solo Designers: Maintain design consistency across projects without extra effort or asset juggling.


How to use the plugin?

  1. Install StyleSnap from the Figma Community.
  2. Right-click on any icon.
  3. Describe the new icon you need.
  4. Let the plugin generate it for you ‚Äì in the exact style, ready to use and royalty-free.

GptToI18n is a very useful plugin tool! Not only can it easily generate i18n with one click, but it can also instantly convert designs into multiple language versions, so that you can easily respond to the global market.


Generate i18n json in one click. This means that you can automatically translate your designs into other languages without having to write any code. This will not only save you time and effort, but also improve your productivity.


We recommend that you finish in draft state, you just need to hold down ctrl + p to open the GptToI18n plugin, select the scope and target language you want to convert, and then click Get JSON, only need to wait a few seconds to complete the i18n JSON generation. The Text name that can be seen is also processed.


If you need to convert your design to the target language version, just click Translate Page from JSON.


Convert design drafts into various languages with one click. No matter where your customers are in the world, they just need to open your design manuscript and instantly understand your product.


Of course, if you do not enter the OpenAi API key, it will cost tokens to get the corresponding JSON, and if you have your own OpenAi API key, then you can use it as much as you like.


So, if you are someone who is good at trying out new tools, then GptToi18n is definitely a good choice not to be missed. It can not only help you save time and effort, improve work efficiency, but also make it easier for your products to enter the global market. Give it a try and let it bring more convenience and success to your work!

GptToI18n is a very useful plugin tool! Not only can it easily generate i18n with one click, but it can also instantly convert designs into multiple language versions, so that you can easily respond to the global market.


Generate i18n json in one click. This means that you can automatically translate your designs into other languages without having to write any code. This will not only save you time and effort, but also improve your productivity.


We recommend that you finish in draft state, you just need to hold down ctrl + p to open the GptToI18n plugin, select the scope and target language you want to convert, and then click Get JSON, only need to wait a few seconds to complete the i18n JSON generation. The Text name that can be seen is also processed.


If you need to convert your design to the target language version, just click Translate Page from JSON.


Convert design drafts into various languages with one click. No matter where your customers are in the world, they just need to open your design manuscript and instantly understand your product.


Of course, if you do not enter the OpenAi API key, it will cost tokens to get the corresponding JSON, and if you have your own OpenAi API key, then you can use it as much as you like.


So, if you are someone who is good at trying out new tools, then GptToi18n is definitely a good choice not to be missed. It can not only help you save time and effort, improve work efficiency, but also make it easier for your products to enter the global market. Give it a try and let it bring more convenience and success to your work!

plugins.name: Swap remote to local instances and variables - Lazy Swap
plugins.description:
1. Swap remote instances to local instances.
  2. Select pages containing components for quick scanning.
  3. Select the necessary local components for quick swapping.
  4. Double-check to ensure all corresponding remote instances are fully converted to local instances.
  5. Swap remote variables to local variables.
  6. Select the types you want to swap.
  7. Double-check to ensure all corresponding remote variables are fully converted to local variables.

Easy and fast conversion. Free for you.
plugins.tagline: Swap remote instances to local instances and remote variables to local variables, easy and fast.

plugins.name: Autolayout converter Helper
plugins.description:
Effortlessly locate frames and take control of your design exploration!!!


Navigate to complex Figma layers with ease! This plugin helps you traverse design hierarchies by stopping at frames and allowing you to decide the next move. Customize your search‚Äîpause anywhere and pick it up whenever you're ready (at that moment perform your change at layer‚ú® ). Perfect for designers and developers who need precise, targeted frame navigation.


Key Features :

  1. Start Search from Any Node : Begin traversal from any selected layer in your Figma file, drilling down through layers and frames.
  2. Stop on Frame Detection : Pauses at each frame, allowing you to review, edit, or proceed to the next frame.
  3. Customisable Navigation : Choose from Next to continue, Skip to bypass children, or Custom Stop to pause as needed.


Use Cases :

  1. Designers and Developers : Streamline work on large, complex Figma files with multiple frames and layers.
  2. Efficient Frame Location : Locate frames quickly, without tedious manual scrolling.
  3. Auto Layout Validation : Essential for platforms or projects requiring strict auto layout adherence for accurate design and responsive outputs. This plugin helps ensure each frame aligns to the full auto layout setup, ensuring optimal structure and consistency.
  4. Flexible Layer Exploration : Customize your traversal to focus on only the layers that matter most for faster design reviews and targeted edits.


How to Use :

  1. Select your starting node in Figma, click Start, and let the plugin begin searching.
  2. When a layer is detected, choose Next to proceed, Skip to bypass children, or Custom Stop to pause where desired.


Boost productivity, stay organized, and manage complex Figma designs with this efficient layers finding plugin. Ideal for design reviews, auto layout validation, focused edits, and streamlined development workflows!
plugins.tagline: Navigate layers with ease: control traversal and reduce your manual drilling time by 40%

plugins.name: Export SVG to Power BI by ventriloc
plugins.description: Export SVG to Power BI by ventriloc streamlines the process of integrating custom SVG's visuals into Power BI. Instead of manually recreating designs, simply export your Figma frame as an SVG, paste it into a Power BI measure, and tweak the code to incorporate dynamic elements like measures and variables. This tool is perfect for designers and analysts who want full creative control over their Power BI visuals without the hassle of complex coding. Want to see more of what ventriloc can do? Visit our website ventriloc.ca !
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly export Figma frames to Power BI as editable SVGs for dynamic, custom visuals.
